website_summaries.verdict: Very lightweight and powerful replacement battery.
pros: Will power all DeWALT line of 7.2-volt tools such as screwdrivers and drills

customer_reviews.title: been getting 4-6 years battery life
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd set of batteries for the awesome Dewalt 7.2 cordless screwdriver. First set of 2 batteries lasted about 6 years. The next 2 batteries lasted 4 years. Hopefully these last a while. The 1 cordless drill is 10 years old and 4 years ago we just bought a whole new drill kit so we had a spare drill and extra charger. We use these in business to work on computers, light drilling duties, furniture assembly, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Andy M

customer_reviews.title: A real Dewalt and it works
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to replace a failing battery. I knew that I wanted an OEM battery (setting aside both sides of the conversation on OEM vs. other manufacturers) but given the reviews where people were sometimes (too often) getting "fakes", I was worried. This was an original and is working well. Only reason for marking it down was the "belief" on my part that the price of batteries is too high.
customer_reviews.author: 2n1

customer_reviews.title: DeWalt DW9057 NiCd battery still in production!
customer_reviews.text: First was my surprise that these batteries are still in production. My battery powered screwdriver has to be about 20 years old, and still going! Package was well padded and arrived faster than I expected; battery charged with no problems; and except for the date of manufacture looked exactly like the last one I bought in 2009!
customer_reviews.author: DougsBro

customer_reviews.title: I love my Dewalt 7.2v drill kit
customer_reviews.text: Harder to find these batteries and will really be bummed when they quit making them as my little drill is my main use drill since it is light and easy to use but still has the strength to general use stuff around the house. My original batteries have lasted 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for! These last twice as long as Powerextra batteries!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these batteries as well as the Powerextra 12v 3000mAh Replacement Batteries, both from Amazon. These batteries are twice the price of the Powerextra batteries and last more than twice as long. These batteries lasted well over 6 years. The Powerextra batteries barely lasted 3 years. Moral of the story: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Glazier

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2, hope they last
customer_reviews.text: My DeWalt electric screwdriver DW920 needs these nicad batteries. There are no LiON replacements, not yet, anyway. I charged them both and have been using them for several weeks on a project. They're OEM just like the originals, no problems. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Richw

customer_reviews.title: DEWALT 7.2-Volt 1.7 Amp Battery DW9057-2
customer_reviews.text: It was nice to positively find genuine OEM Dewalt 7.2V batteries at a reasonable price. I have been looking at a lot of them online, but it often seems difficult to determine whether I would be buying the real thing, refurbished batteries or generics, which I wasn't interested in. Thankfully, these are exactly the same DW9057 1.7 Ampere-Hour rated batteries as the ones that originally came with my Dewalt DW920 cordless screwdriver. They are working just as well as the old batteries did when new, so overall I'm very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: SJK

customer_reviews.title: Poor longevity
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these batteries as a replacement for my original that finally died and I am not impressed with the quality. I don't know what the difference is between the battery that came with the tool verses these replacement batteries but they don't last long at all after a full charge. Definitely not worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Gary1948

customer_reviews.title: Great battery
customer_reviews.text: I have a Dewalt 7.2 volt screwdriver that uses these batteries. The tool is extremely useful because of how light these batteries are. They also have a great capacity and had plenty of charge for any project I have attempted. We use Amazon for most of our purchases and I update my reviews if anything changes with the products. I do this so other Amazon users can get a real feel for the life of the product. I am not associated with any company and all opinions are my very own.
customer_reviews.author: James P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Batteries
customer_reviews.text: We had purchased cheaper, third-party replacement batteries that did not last more than a day or two between recharges. Fed up, we purchased a pair of DeWalt batteries a few months ago. The DeWalt batteries are far superior to the others. They last for weeks before needing to recharge. We use them daily and have no complaints about them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great battery for this series of DeWalt powered screwdrivers
customer_reviews.text: This worked great! What else is there to say? (I think when I purchased this back in 2013, the price was several dollars less).
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Genuine battery.  Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Genuine Dewalt product in factory packing. Works great in my electric screwdriver. No reason to buy the knockoff, many of which get poor reviews, when you can buy the real thing at this price.
customer_reviews.author: W. Grant

customer_reviews.title: I was glad to see I could buy a replacement battery for ...
customer_reviews.text: I was glad to see I could buy a replacement battery for my Dewalt power screw driver. The new battery works great and my electric screw driver is back in working order.
customer_reviews.author: Pickles

customer_reviews.title: Solid Power
customer_reviews.text: this is just a replacement battery for the 7.2 volt power screwdriver made by Dewalt. This is a solid power source and seems to hold discharge for A fair amount of time. This particular model by Dewalt is one of the most powerful units I have ever used. I have had mine over 8 years and it's still will do everything I want with a huge amount of torque.
customer_reviews.author: LeeR

customer_reviews.title: True DEWALT Battery
customer_reviews.text: True DEWALT Battery not fake as others reviewd as such
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt 7.2 volt battery
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 7.2 volt Dewalt cordless driver on e-bay and the batteries would not hold a charge. The Dewalt rep advised me when I called that the batteries were six years old when I bought it, so I ordered a new one from Amazon and it works fine and does a lot of work before needing a charge. It has changed my mind about this tool. It really is a workhorse and powerful enough for most projects that I do. I don't even need a second battery to do most of the jobs that require a drill.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Revived an old DeWalt favorite tool!
customer_reviews.text: I am now able to use an old DeWalt driver that I thought would be lost to this world! New batteries just gave it a new life!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price & quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: It’s a battery to run a tool To soon to rate life.
customer_reviews.author: herbert barnard

customer_reviews.title: 1 (one) or 2 (two) pack for $62?
customer_reviews.text: The pictures and product description(s) are possibly misleading. It shows 2 (two) batteries in the photos and in the product description at the end states there are 2 (two) batteries for basically $62. I did receive 1 (one) authentic DW9057 battery but would like the other battery or my money back so I can purchase 2 batteries for basically the same price $65 from the DEWALT factory outlet store. 1 (one) battery for $62 is very overpriced and not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mansa

customer_reviews.title: One of my most used tools
customer_reviews.text: This battery fits one of my most used tools, the dewalt screw driver. I use it every weekend, some week days, and have been using it for about three years. Battery life is very good, usually an hour or two of steady use. The unit comes with two rechargeable batteries, that charge quickly. I purchased a new battery because one of the two originals after three years of steady use has started to loose its ability to hold a charge very long. The new one works great.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L Chisum

customer_reviews.title: Small package
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a second battery to use with my power screwdriver. The DeWalt has more power than the B&D and generics that I've had in the past, and this battery helps keep me going all day. Amazon/DeWalt had a deal on DeWalt products, so I got this with a vac, free shipping, and saved a bunch! Good service and FAST shipping! I received my Super Saver shipment faster than another product I ordered the same day and PAID for shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Shopman Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great for the light-duty tools
customer_reviews.text: I use these batteries for my screwdriver I purchased almost 10 years ago. I use it in electrical construction daily and battery lasts for 2 days under normal usage. If you can get the old Dewalt 7.2v screwdrivers (no longer at my local Home Dee-pot) grab it while you can. These are great for electricians and low-voltage contractors alike!
customer_reviews.author: Jonny B

customer_reviews.title: Original battery.
customer_reviews.text: Only had for about two months. We will see how long it last.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: They charge up pretty fast and last a pretty long time, depending upon your task. They can last for years depending upon your demands.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie W

customer_reviews.title: the electric screwdriver is my favorite tool. don't know what happened to the last ...
customer_reviews.text: the electric screwdriver is my favorite tool. don't know what happened to the last battery, but it's gone. this is a great replacement at a fraction of the cost. works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Battery at a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: The original batteries for my DeWalt drill would no longer hold a charge, so I purchased two of these at what I felt like was an extremely good price. The first one charged right up using my original charger, and works flawlessly with the drill. Haven't charged the second one yet, but I expect it to perform just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alex A.

customer_reviews.title: its just ok
customer_reviews.text: This is not a real DeWalt product but an aftermarket replacement battery. After using it for several months, and properly draining and charging it every time, it just does not hold a charge for long. I haven't gotten nearly the time between charges with it as I did with the real DeWalt battery. It drains very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: pt1655

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Used for an older 7.2 v screw driver. plan to get some more life out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Jenks

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this battery as a replacement for a dead work tool battery. It works well and as expected. I say "as expected" because one of my primary job functions is to supply 8-10 commercial field plumbers with tools/material and over the years we have noticed a decline in the quality of Dewalt brand power tools.
customer_reviews.author: J. Matias

customer_reviews.title: dewalt battery
customer_reviews.text: fast shipping, these are hard to find in most stores, theses are orginal dewalt not an aftermarket battery. i have had problems with the cheap rebuilds and foreign exchange batteries in the past. Being orginal dewalt they work fine and are new. Also saved about $20.00 for the pair versus in retail store Plus no tax and free shipping right to the door.
customer_reviews.author: TJ RODS

customer_reviews.title: 7.2 Dewalt Battery
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast and holding good charge. Works with my charging unit.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sternberg

customer_reviews.title: Powerful just like brand new
customer_reviews.text: DEWALT does not make the drill that uses these batteries, but it is such a good drill, they still make batteries to fit it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Beckus

customer_reviews.title: DEWALT 7.2 VOLT BATTERIES
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find these batteries in our city. As usual if I cannot find things here local I know I can find them on the internet and Amazon is usually the first place I start. The batteries are new and have the power and lasting power they should have. I am very pleased with the purchase and the speed in which they arrived. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: George Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: DEWALT DW9057 BATTERY
customer_reviews.text: Battery is Factory replacement , Bought one From DEWALT and came in same packaging same label on Battery , Holds good charge.
customer_reviews.author: Vintage Man

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This battery is better than the cheaper battery I bought 6 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: thomas bell

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: congratulations DeWall is my favorite tool brand. I would like to receive promotional products to decorate my professional and hooby workshop. excellent product Good quality, works great I am satisfied. meet delivery time. the vendor is serious negotiation.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben German Mora Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value - why buy aftermarket?
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable! Battery price is a few bucks more than aftermarket. With this small difference dollar difference, why bother saving a few bucks with aftermarket batteries and hope it doesn't blow up or ruin your charger? Not worth it! DeWalt did the right thing and made this battery very competitive!
customer_reviews.author: Eric T.

customer_reviews.title: its a good bargain for a hard to find battery
customer_reviews.text: If you use the tool that requires this battery, its a good bargain for a hard to find battery!
customer_reviews.author: D York

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They seem to work just fine and seem to be holding a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Trooper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Replacement
customer_reviews.text: It only took a couple of days for my new replacement battery to arrive and it is exactly as advertised. I put it on the charger until the charging light said it was done, then put it to work. There is no difference between this battery and the one I'm retiring, except this one actually holds a charge.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Hanig

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple of third party batteries like these a couple of years ago and neither lasted very long. This time I bought these Dewalt batteries and I feel they will last a long time like the original Dewalt batteries did. Guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Holds a great charge to replace 2 that didn't anymore because I ...
customer_reviews.text: Holds a great charge to replace 2 that didn't anymore because I left them sitting in the garage a few summers here, (gets to 110), which kills batteries, very happy with this one
customer_reviews.author: RCS

customer_reviews.title: that it fit
customer_reviews.text: was so glad to be able to find a replacement battery. It arrived quickly and fits the screwdriver great.
customer_reviews.author: Pam C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, Replaced some old ones that I had.These works great. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: H. W

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been a fan of the Dewalt products but this battery seems to be working well. Recharge is good and I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: logy

customer_reviews.title: best price i could find
customer_reviews.text: for my cordless screwdriver. appear to be authentic dewalt batteries. with moderate use, the original batteries lasted almost 5 years. i am happy to get 3 years from batteries like these. the best price i could find was here on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Flashotron

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was a replacement for a much older one that died. Charged and worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Knarf

customer_reviews.title: These are NOT Dewalt Batteries
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how people are thinking these are real Dewalt batteries... they are NOT. I have attached 3 pictures. Not only are these not real batteries they are knock off chinese garbage batteries. I put them in my charger and they squeal like someone is getting pinched. The charger doesn't want to charge them either... Tried three different charges. Do yourself a favor and do NOT purchase these from this seller and get the REAL dewalt batteries from Amazon that are sold in a single pack! -Nigel
customer_reviews.author: Nigel

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt 7.2 Volt batteries for Drill Driver
customer_reviews.text: [...] These batteries are perfect for my Dewalt Drill Driver. I use this tool every day and spare batteries are a must. As the batteries will sit without use some times for days and they still hold their charge makes me very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Little

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality battery. Don't buy any aftermarket batteries. Expend a little bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Just what was needed.
customer_reviews.text: We had a very hard time finding this battery in any store, even the battery specialty stores. The price here seemed reasonable and so far, works perfectly. So glad we found it, the tool would have been useless without a battery.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: have three of these screw drivers because the battery were to expensive so I would just buy the whole kit. There great for my work and just powerful enough for a screw gun. Now I can get the battery at a cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: flagboy

customer_reviews.title: ... for my husbands battery screwdriver and 1 had gone bad and would not stay charged
customer_reviews.text: Ordered another battery for my husbands battery screwdriver and 1 had gone bad and would not stay charged...this one works great!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie N Williams

customer_reviews.title: Battery works like new
customer_reviews.text: I love my few years old DeWalt screw driver and rejoiced when I found that replacement batteries are available. The new battery was delivered on schedule and works as well as the batteries with the device when it was new. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Shane

customer_reviews.title: This product was fastly shipped
customer_reviews.text: My headline says it all. Because well that's all that I can say being that I bought the wrong damn size. I thank god I was treated well and fairly on my return.
customer_reviews.author: Justabout51hobos

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Battery
customer_reviews.text: I was given a small DEWALT power hammer screw driver kit by a friend. When I went to use it the original battery was bad. So I purchased this replacement battery and now all is good.
customer_reviews.author: Skip Davis

customer_reviews.title: DEWALT DW9057 Compact 7.2-Volt 1.7 Amp Hour NiCd Pod Style Battery
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for a battery that came with the original DEWALT product and I find it very reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Carter

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Its a battery and it works. Although I gave 4 stars because I wish they would last longer (cycles not battery time.)and the cost is a little spendy considering the price of the drill 2 batteries and a charger really isnt that much more.
customer_reviews.author: D M

customer_reviews.title: Extra power always good to have
customer_reviews.text: Charges quickly in a Dewalt charger. Always good to have additional backup batteries so you don't run out of power when there's no time to wait for a recharge.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: As good as the batteries that came with the original (power screwdriver). The only drawback... not much more and you can buy the whole screwdriver kit new with new batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Gary F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They work well, I just hope they last longer than the other six before them.
customer_reviews.author: John   Brown

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Charges well, holds a charge as expected and is a perfect match for the OEM battery I replaces.
customer_reviews.author: Aardvark (fka Dalesky)

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Power for a 7.2 Volt Battery
customer_reviews.text: I use battery operated tools almost exclusively. The DeWalt drill-driver that uses this battery is amazingly powerful. I keep several back-up batteries charged and ready to go at all times.
customer_reviews.author: GreenHead

customer_reviews.title: Great!! Holds the charge
customer_reviews.text: Great!! Holds the charge. My husband is very happy with the charger - he was able to complete projects without having to stop and recharge.
customer_reviews.author: Beachnut

customer_reviews.title: Spare power
customer_reviews.text: The spare DeWalt 7.2 volt NiCd battery makes completing the job easier allowing for continuous power after the original batteries run down on the job site.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this battery to replace the one that powers my cordless screwdriver. You just can't beat the price and it's the same product found a big box home improvement stores for around $15-20 more.
customer_reviews.author: LIM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price for true DeWalt product
customer_reviews.text: This is a genuine DeWalt battery, and at an excellent price. Be aware that many of the batteries offered here and elsewhere under the DeWalt product number are from other manufacturers -- maybe equal or better, or maybe not.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Cannon

customer_reviews.title: it pays to buy the real thing
customer_reviews.text: After putting up with batteries on the edge of their life, this replacement came as a godsend. It keeps it's power and charge through long use, re-charges quickly, and over-all is a great value for consistent performance.
customer_reviews.author: DavidP

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Find DeWalt Product
customer_reviews.text: Able to get a very useful tool back in service. The 7.2 volt battery size is hard to find, but Amazon came through. It was cheaper to buy a new battery than have the old ones rebuilt!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: DeWalt DW9057 Compact 7.2-Volt 1.7 Amp Hour NiCad Pod Style Battery
customer_reviews.text: This Dewalt NiCad battery that I purchased through Amazon.com is in all appearences an exact duplicate of the battery that I am replacing it with. So far the battery has worked as good as the original battery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What my husband was looking for and less expensive then buying through Home Depot or Lowes
customer_reviews.author: cav

customer_reviews.title: GOOD deal from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: works as expected and less money than Home De Pot or Lowe grade stores
customer_reviews.author: E W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too bad its a Ni Cad. Doesn't appear they ever upgraded to Lithium. Use on DeWalt Screwdriver
customer_reviews.author: Retired1

customer_reviews.title: Fit and worked!
customer_reviews.text: No issues. Slightly more snug than original, but works fine with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Graves

customer_reviews.title: Better than clone batteries.
customer_reviews.text: The DeWalt 7.2 volt drivers get used all day in a compressor warranty analysis lab. These DeWalt batteries hold up much better than the clone batteries we have tried. Price at AMAZON is best I could find.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Todd

customer_reviews.title: I Does Its Job
customer_reviews.text: There's not much to say about a battery! This little guy does his job and keeps our tools humming, buzzing, and getting the job done!
customer_reviews.author: high plains teacher

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt 7.2 volt battery
customer_reviews.text: These are great batteries and a great valve for the cost. They are dependable and I use them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: busybee47

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The old batteries for my DeWalt power screw driver died after many years, and this one replaced...well, one of them. It works as advertised, although a bit steep in price.
customer_reviews.author: Yoshmann

customer_reviews.title: Power me up, Scotty!
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say here! The battery arrived relatively drained as expected, threw a full charge on it and now my DeWalt cordless screwdriver/drill is alive, alive, once again...tackling all of those jobs the tool is perfect for! The old/original battery lived for 5 years before I finally had to spring for this replacement, so I guess I should be good to go until, what? 2015???
customer_reviews.author: POPPOP

customer_reviews.title: A great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have several drills that use these batteries and they hold up as good if not better than the original. A good price for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan L. Frisby

customer_reviews.title: Good scource for replacement batteries
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement battery. Save me much money versus buying at local store. Works great after 1 year. Good value for Dewalt.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: POWER TO THE TOOLS
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how bad the old batteries were until I started using the new ones. The screw driver always worked well, but when the batteries died, that was it. Big box stores can't be bothered with reasonably priced replacement parts - the guy at L...'s didn't even know there was a 7.2 volt battery!!!
customer_reviews.author: BOBBO

customer_reviews.title: dewalt 7.2 volt battery
customer_reviews.text: Battery out of the package had a good charge, which is was a good sign. I fully charged it and am very happy with how it performed.
customer_reviews.author: ArgentX

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a replacement
customer_reviews.text: The purchase through Amazon was quick as I had the tiem within two days. Perfect replacement and i'm back to work. Since switching to DeWalt tools, I've had very little trouble at all.
customer_reviews.author: HB33

customer_reviews.title: Exact replacement for my screwdriver.
customer_reviews.text: Good price for replacement on my DeWalt screwdriver, which is an excellent product. One battery is easily enough for most casual uses.
customer_reviews.author: Richard E. J. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Holds up!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to power my space ship to Mars. It is working remarkably well considering.
customer_reviews.author: Just Lucky

customer_reviews.title: replacement
customer_reviews.text: i bought this battery for an extra one to have on charge while using the other batteries. a very good value, the price was right
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was glad I could still buy it. I have had the screw driver for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Notadev

customer_reviews.title: All Amazon-related processes were first class!
customer_reviews.text: As usual with AMZN, all aspects of the purchasing & fulfillment processes were first class; thank you! Our negative comments are reserved for the batteries themselves. We've spend too much money on replacements. We'd really believe in the batteries if overcharging could be avoided.
customer_reviews.author: NPSJr

customer_reviews.title: These work great with our screw driver.
customer_reviews.text: These work just like the original ones that came with the screw driver. They are doing a good job now.
customer_reviews.author: GE-BJ

customer_reviews.title: holder1
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these for the best price and got them from amazon. My old ones had finally wore out and wouldnt charge up. These new ones got my dewalt screwgun back to 100 percent and running screws like the unit was doing when I bought it brand new. Thanks amazon for the best price I could find anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: chris  e holderman

customer_reviews.title: DOES THE JOB
customer_reviews.text: I GOT THESE BATTERIES FOR MY 7.2 POWER SCREWDRIVER. THEY GET HEAVY USE IN MY HANDYMAN BUSINESS, AND PERFORM VERY WELL. I RECOMMEND THEM TO ANYONE WHO NEEDS SUCH A TOOL. JOHN
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: dewalt 7.2 battery
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cordless screwdriver while working in the Los Angeles area. The tool was a life saver on the work I was performing. You have to have the battery to make it work. The previous batteries were great and lasted a long while. I only wish the dewalt battery had the same fuel gauge as the Milwaukee batteries
customer_reviews.author: Emanuel Vernon

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My screwdriver drill is back in operation. In use for about 6 months now. Very happy. Would buy this again. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: jabbadehut60

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find De Walt
customer_reviews.text: It is good to finely find a battery for the old screwdriver of De Walt. Works well and took a charge right away.
customer_reviews.author: Tom T.

customer_reviews.title: These were the best bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: I use my compact screwdriver every day and having extra rechargeble batteries in my garage and truck keeps me going and going and.....
customer_reviews.author: Craig C.

customer_reviews.title: DeWalt  7.2 Volt Battery
customer_reviews.text: This battery is an exact manufacturer's replacement and works as good as an original new battery and is identical in appearance. My original battery lasted about 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Szymonik

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Service
customer_reviews.text: What can you say, DeWalt is a Great Product. Only wish the batteries would last longer but all manufactures have the same problem. Amazon's service is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: This battery was from the manufacture and is fine.
customer_reviews.text: It was what I needed and not able to find any where in Miami. I have ordered batteries from Amazon for my Nikon camera. And they were from China and luckey for them to last for 25 pictures. This battery was from the manufacture and is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Sundman

customer_reviews.title: OEM Batteries
customer_reviews.text: These are OEM batteries, they work very well, They hold their charge for a long time and the run time is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Bart

product_meta.title: DEWALT 7.2V Battery, NiCd Pod Style, 1.7-Ah (DW9057)
product_meta.description:
15-percent smaller and 10-percent lighter than standard batteries, the DeWalt DW9057 Compact 7.2-volt 1.7 amp-hour Ni-Cad Pod Style Battery is compatible with all DeWalt 7.2-volt tools (except Univolt tools), a feature that allows you to run multiple tools off of the same battery pack.

AMAZON.COM
15-percent smaller and 10-percent lighter than standard batteries, the DeWalt DW9057 Compact 7.2-volt 1.7 amp-hour Ni-Cad Pod Style Battery is compatible with all DeWalt 7.2-volt tools (except Univolt tools), a feature that allows you to run multiple tools off of the same battery pack.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The DEWALT DW9057 7.2-volt compact battery pack is small in size, but big on performance. In fact, it’s 15% smaller and 10% lighter than standard batteries of the same voltage, yet it pumps out 1.7-amp-hours of reliable, long-lasting power. This pod-style NiCad battery will power the entire line of DEWALT 7.2-volt tools (except Univolt tools), allowing you to run multiple tools off the same pack. It’s backed by DEWALT’s 90-day money-back guarantee, one-year free service contract, and three-year limited warranty.

See more
